pages.text: And know that whatever you take as spoils of war, a fifth of it is for God and the messenger and for those who are relatives and the orphans and the poor and the wayfarer, if you believe in God and that which We sent down on Our servant on the day of distinction, the day the two parties met (at Badr), and God has power over everything

when you were on the nearer side (of the valley) and they were on the further side and the caravan was on your lower side, and if you had made a mutual appointment, you would have gone against the appointment, but (this arrangement was made) in order that God may accomplish an affair which was to be executed : that he who perished might perish (being involved) in a clear proof and he who survived might live (after having been involved) in a clear proof, and God is certainly One Who hears, knows

And (remember) when God showed them less in your dream, and had He showed them numerous you would have become weak hearted and you would have disputed about the affair, but God kept you safe, He is certainly the Knower of that which is in the hearts

and when He showed them to you less in your eyes when you met (them) and He made you to appear less in their eyes, in order that God may accomplish an affair which was to be executed and to God are (all) affairs returned
O you who believe ! when you meet a group (of enemies) then be firm and remember God much that you may be successful
